name: hopAppYoshidaHaloMerge
description:
The Hands-on Portal Halo Merge application loader is used to load the Webbles necessary for the Halo Merge application developed for the Hands-on Portal project.

This Webble will also react to resizing of the browser window and try to resize and move the visualization Webbles around to fit the new browser window size.
keywords: Digital Dashboard, Hands-on Portal, hop, Yoshida group, app, dashboardTNG
author: digitalDashboardTNG
